name: Brave Fencer Musashiden: Square Millennium Collection
description:
This Japan only re-release of Brave Fencer Musashi was part of the Square Millennium Collection, a collection of Square games packaged in a bigger box with several collectible items.

This release contained:
  • The game Brave Fencer Musashi.
  • A pouch designed to hold a Game Boy Colour or Wonderswan.
  • A set of five post cards.
  • A Minku wristband with a set of attachable Minkus.
